desc: This course provides a theoretical and practical foundation for assisting secondary readers. Students learn the essentials of good reading instruction and apply them in the making of a three-week literature unit. Required 10-hour field experience. Prerequisites: Education 290 and 330, or permission of instructor. Offered Spring Semester only.
name: Teaching Reading 5-12
prerequisites: Prerequisites: Education 290 and 330, or permission of instructor. Offered Spring Semester only.
title: Teaching of Reading 5-12
